home.title: Naturalization Practice Hub
home.subtitle: Practice for the U.S. civics test with multiple languages.
home.question: Do you want to practice? Which method works best for you?
home.quizDescription: Test your knowledge with multiple-choice questions and see your score.
home.flashcardsDescription: Review questions one at a time with interactive flashcards.
home.grammarDescription: Learn and practice English grammar for the citizenship interview.
home.glossaryDescription: Learn key terms and definitions with multi-language and voice reading support.
home.suggestion: Try all four and see which helps you learn better!

footer.text: Made with ☕ over many days. By byteMing.

quiz.title: Quiz Mode
quiz.practiceDesc: Practice with instant feedback and 10 sample questions
quiz.testDesc: Simulate the real test: up to 20 questions, need 12+ to pass
quiz.passMessage: Congratulations! You passed with {correct} out of {total} correct. (Need 12+ to pass)
quiz.failMessage: You scored {correct} out of {total}. You need at least 12 correct answers to pass.
